item.description: The initiative launches with $1 million from Banc of California used to support retailers, restaurants and other independent businesses in Altadena, Malibu and Pacific Palisades with direct grants up

item.title: Why It’s Taking LA So Long to Rebuild After the Wildfires
item.description: Reforming California’s environmental rules is only a small step to rebuilding Los Angeles after the fires in January.
